text: Juan Diego Alba Bolívar (born 11 September 1997 in Tuta, Boyacá) is a Colombian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . ==Major results== ;2019 : 3rd Overall Giro Ciclistico d'Italia ::1st Stage 6 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:People from Boyacá Department
title: Juan Diego Alba
